tool.name: SAGA.statistics_regression.13
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayTABLE False isArrayDEPENDENT False output_data_RESULTS $output_data_RESULTS output_data_INFO_COEFF $output_data_INFO_COEFF output_data_INFO_MODEL $output_data_INFO_MODEL output_data_INFO_STEPS $output_data_INFO_STEPS name SAGA.statistics_regression.13 TABLE $TABLE DEPENDENT $DEPENDENT METHOD $METHOD P_VALUE $P_VALUE CROSSVAL $CROSSVAL CROSSVAL_K $CROSSVAL_K prefer $prefer response $response outputType_RESULTS $OutputSection_RESULTS.outputType_RESULTS transmissionMode_RESULTS $OutputSection_RESULTS.transmissionMode_RESULTS outputType_INFO_COEFF $OutputSection_INFO_COEFF.outputType_INFO_COEFF transmissionMode_INFO_COEFF $OutputSection_INFO_COEFF.transmissionMode_INFO_COEFF outputType_INFO_MODEL $OutputSection_INFO_MODEL.outputType_INFO_MODEL transmissionMode_INFO_MODEL $OutputSection_INFO_MODEL.transmissionMode_INFO_MODEL outputType_INFO_STEPS $OutputSection_INFO_STEPS.outputType_INFO_STEPS transmissionMode_INFO_STEPS $OutputSection_INFO_STEPS.transmissionMode_INFO_STEPS

param.name: TABLE
param.label: Shapes
param.help: Shapes The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, xml

param.name: DEPENDENT
param.label: Dependent Variable
param.help: Dependent Variable The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: P_VALUE
param.label: Significance Level
param.help: Significance level (aka p-value) as threshold for automated predictor selection, given as percentage

param.name: CROSSVAL_K
param.label: Cross Validation Subsamples
param.help: number of subsamples for k-fold cross validation

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_RESULTS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_RESULTS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_INFO_COEFF
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_INFO_COEFF
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_INFO_MODEL
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_INFO_MODEL
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_INFO_STEPS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_INFO_STEPS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Multiple linear regression analysis using ordinary least squares.
